about_the_game:
This DLC upgrades your experience from a Player to a Game Master, with no-limit access to RPG Stories collection of 3D assets, animated heroes and monsters, and more features. You will be able to host a game as the GM and of course, continue joining as a Player.




We know you are tired of spending hours preparing your TT RPG sessions. That's why RPG Stories comes with a lot of Auto-Building features, 5000 3D Models, and pre-made maps! In addition, we give you all our assets into modular pieces to manually create anything you like.

Upcoming: 5000 more models in 2024, that will come with free updates, Multi-Level Building, and more.




RPG Stories supports all Eras of TT RPGs and allows you to play your sessions online with your friends. We provide the GM with several authorities to customize the experience plus the ability to use the World-Builder while playing.

Upcoming: This is the alpha version of the online Multiplayer. We will be giving monthly updates that will improve the game system, the camera system, and the VFX and animations.




Our VTT comes with several pre-built quests that you can load, read, and play right away. You can find more on our website or download from other users in the Steam Workshop.

Upcoming: We aim to have a vast collection of pre-built quests soon.




No more 3rd party text pads. We provide you with a journal and a 3D Quest Notes Tool to create and use everything within RPG Stories.

Upcoming: Handouts, Journal Linked to Camera System.




When asked if we have Fog of War, we answer that this won't be enough. RPG Stories has all the well-known VTT Features like Fog of War, Weather System, Light Sources, 3D Dice, Environmental Lighting, and...well the list is vast!

Upcoming: Dynamic Lights, Camera, and Walking Synchronization.




We want RPG Stories to become the Community's VTT and that is why we made the following decisions:
· All our exports will always be Commercial-Free.

· We allow our community to vote on features and models to be implemented in our discord server





We allow you to customize the shape of every single model we have, to group items and save them as one in your collection, and of course to upload them into Steam Workshop.

Upcoming: Customize floors, Customize Characters
